segment.source: WPA Query Syntax
segment.target: WPA Query Syntax

segment.source: WPA Query Syntax
segment.target: WPA Query Syntax

segment.source: WPA Query Syntax
segment.target: WPA Query Syntax

segment.source: The syntax search and filtering components of Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA) are an extension to Windows query syntax.
segment.target: The syntax search and filtering components of Windows Performance Analyzer (WPA) are an extension to Windows query syntax.

segment.source: For more information, see Advanced Query Syntax.
segment.target: For more information, see Advanced Query Syntax.

segment.source: Available Extensions
segment.target: Available Extensions

segment.source: The following table describes the available extensions.
segment.target: The following table describes the available extensions.

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Examples
segment.target: Examples

segment.source: Property names can contain spaces and other non-alphanumeric characters if the spaces or characters are enclosed in square brackets.
segment.target: Property names can contain spaces and other non-alphanumeric characters if the spaces or characters are enclosed in square brackets.

segment.source: The asterisk RegEx operator (*) is allowed on string types.
segment.target: The asterisk RegEx operator (*) is allowed on string types.

segment.source: The following query matches both iexplore and explorer, but not myexplorer:
segment.target: The following query matches both iexplore and explorer, but not myexplorer:

segment.source: Memory size suffixes (KB, MB, GB) and time units (s, ms, us, ns) on double and integer literals are supported.
segment.target: Memory size suffixes (KB, MB, GB) and time units (s, ms, us, ns) on double and integer literals are supported.

segment.source: These suffixes are not case-sensitive.
segment.target: These suffixes are not case-sensitive.

segment.source: Flexible precision on float literals for equality operations is supported.
segment.target: Flexible precision on float literals for equality operations is supported.

segment.source: Precision is based on the number of decimal digits that the query contains.
segment.target: Precision is based on the number of decimal digits that the query contains.

segment.source: can potentially yield a larger result set than .
segment.target: can potentially yield a larger result set than .

segment.source: You may want to restrict a search scope to a subset of rows by series name.
segment.target: You may want to restrict a search scope to a subset of rows by series name.

segment.source: The series name is the name of the right-most non-empty column to the left of the gold bar.
segment.target: The series name is the name of the right-most non-empty column to the left of the gold bar.

segment.source: In the following table, the series name for rows 1-6 is Process.
segment.target: In the following table, the series name for rows 1-6 is Process.

segment.source: For all other rows, the series name is Module.
segment.target: For all other rows, the series name is Module.

segment.source: wpa search
segment.target: wpa search

segment.source: If you query for , rows 6-13 are selected.
segment.target: If you query for , rows 6-13 are selected.

segment.source: If you query for , only row 6 is selected.
segment.target: If you query for , only row 6 is selected.

segment.source: If you query for , rows 7-13 are selected.
segment.target: If you query for , rows 7-13 are selected.
